comments: Self defense with Eddie is amazing. He\'s nice and his instructions are pretty clear. The course is well designed, and attendance does matter, but the class was fun, so I wasn\'t interested in skipping. Has extra credit opportunities. Everyone should take this.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Coach Lott was just great. He makes learning self-defense fun and not intimidating. It was worth taking it as an 8am. You will have to have a partner in the class kind of make it an easy way to meet people. Show up and participate. As long as you try he will pass. He also is kind of funny.

stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  EXTRA CREDIT  HILARIOUS
comments: I totally loved Self Defense with Coach Lott. Show up and participate, and you can learn some awesome moves. He\'s good at what he does, and he wants you to succeed.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Self-defense was an amazing class to take with him! So much extra credit and he\'s an easy grader. Participation is a grade and essential to knowing what is on the exams

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Coach Lott is a great guy. He\'s really into teaching self defense. He really cares about his students. He\'s alway trying to make you laugh. It\'s an enjoyable class and he makes it easy it show up and participate. It\'s can be intimidating when you don\'t know anyone like I did because you do have to work with partners. I recommend him and the class!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I loved Coach Lott! He was hilarious and an amazing instructor. He showed you multiple times how to do the releases and there were only 3 skills tests & 3 online tests throughout the semester. No final. If you show up and put any effort into your skills tests, you\'ll get 100s. Would definitely take him again. Wish there was a 2nd year class!!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mr. Lott was a great Self-Defense teacher. He really made sure that everyone understood the combinations, and made the "skills tests" really easy. He is a GREAT self-defense teacher. I would definitely take him again, and I have recommended him to many of my friends.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mr. Lott is really funny (corny and punny but I liked it) and he\'s very passionate about what he teaches. even though I took the 8am class I still liked it. He is very easy going and long winded. Make sure you show up and read the syllabus and emails. He\'s easy to talk to and personable. plus he\'s not bad looking either

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Had him for self defense - very good instructor! Gives extra credit throughout semester. Very easy to understand. Online tests are the same as any KINS class. Skills tests are easy. As long as you participate and actually try you will get an A. Lots of warming up and core workouts as well. Takes off 4 points for each absence (that\'s why there\'s EC)

comments: awesome professor, very clear with instructions. Fun class to have, easy A

comments: This class is so much fun! It requires a lot of partner work & attendance is mandatory, but he gives extra credit. Take this class because you won\'t regret it!!

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This class was so much fun. There is an attendance policy but you definately wont want to miss his class. He makes self defense easy to learn and hes funny.

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I absolutely LOVED this class! Mr. Lott was a very good teacher and very funny (though yes, corny at times). Class was always interesting and it wasn\'t too challenging but you still got a good workout. As long as you try and have a good attitude, you should get an A easily.

comments: Easy and great class! Prof. Lott is extremely helpful! No textbook, only the access code is required and attendance is like all other KINS classes... miss 7 days and automatic fail. Great class to attend

comments: This guy was an AMAZING teacher! Im pushing the school to open up a Self-Defense Intermediate course. Easy A if you just pay attention and practice your moves. He\'s hilarious, flexible, and pretty hot. :]

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He\'s relatively funny in a corny way and genuinely tries to help you. If you have a problem and explain the situation he will work with you. Overall a good teacher and although the extra credit classes were tough work I had fun doing them. :)

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mr. Lott is a very good and easy Self Defense teacher. Hes lenient on his skills test and will give extra credit surveys and classes. You must try hard to not get an A in his class

tag_professor: EXTRA CREDIT (5)  Participation matters (5)  Hilarious (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had him for self defense. He is really corny and tries so hard to be funny but hes really cool. He will offer you classes at him tae-kwon-do studio for a very cheap price. Do it! Its hard but you\'ll love it! Overall a great teacher. You have to do a little reading but its very simple stuff you might even be able to get away with not buying a book
